meta.title: Roundnet Directory Europe - Find Spikeball Clubs Near You
meta.description: Discover Roundnet and Spikeball clubs, communities, and events across Europe. Find training sessions, tournaments, and players in your city.
meta.keywords: roundnet, spikeball, clubs, europe, find, near me, tournaments, training

hero.title: Find Roundnet Clubs in Europe
hero.subtitle: Connect with Spikeball communities, join training sessions, and compete in tournaments near you.

cta.title: Know a Club That's Missing?
cta.subtitle: Help us build the most comprehensive Roundnet directory in Europe.

clubs.title: Roundnet Clubs
clubs.subtitle: Find your local Spikeball community
clubs.noResults: No clubs found matching your criteria.
clubs.tryAnother: Try adjusting your filters or search in a different area.

club.contactClub: Contact this club for more information.

submit.title: Submit Your Club
submit.subtitle: Add your Roundnet club or community to our directory. All submissions are reviewed before publishing.

form.name: Club Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your club, when you meet, skill levels welcome, etc.
form.privacyText: I confirm that I have permission to submit this club's information and consent to its publication on this directory. Email and phone will only be displayed with explicit permission.

success.title: Thank You!
success.message: Your submission has been received. Our team will review it and publish it within 48 hours.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

events.title: Roundnet Events
events.subtitle: Tournaments, training sessions, and meetups across Europe
events.checkBack: Check back soon or submit your own event.

blog.title: Roundnet Blog
blog.subtitle: Tips, techniques, news, and stories from the European Roundnet community

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We're building the most comprehensive directory of Roundnet clubs and communities in Europe. Our goal is to make it easy for anyone to find and join their local Spikeball community.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.text: This directory is community-powered. Help us grow by submitting clubs, suggesting corrections, or contributing translations.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you.

footer.tagline: Finding your Roundnet community across Europe
